cst8284.triviatime

Class QA

  • java.lang.Object
    • cst8284.triviatime.QARequirements
      • cst8284.triviatime.QA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class QA
extends QARequirements
    This class Represents a QA(Question Answer) object
    Since:
    1.8
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    David Houtman, Gurkirat Singh Toor
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String[] answers
      answers Array contains the various available options for the question
      private java.lang.String category
      category represents topic of java the question is related to
      private int correctAnswer
      correctAnswer represents the number of correct answer
      private int difficulty
      difficulty represents the difficulty level of the question
      private java.lang.String explanation
      explanation contains the explanation for the right Answer
      private int points
      points represents points given for correct answer
      private java.lang.String question
      question contains the String representing the Question
      private boolean result
      result represents if the user entered correct or wrong answer for that question

    • Constructor Detail

      • QA

        public QA(java.lang.String q,
          java.lang.String[] a,
          java.lang.String c,
          java.lang.String e,
          int diff,
          int point,
          int an)
        Constructor to create QA objects by using the specified question,answers Array,category,difficulty,points,correctAnswer,explanation,
        Parameters:
        q - the question of the QA Object
        a - the answers array containing the all the possible answers
        c - the category the QA object belongs to
        e - the explanation for the correct Answer
        diff - the difficulty level of question
        point - points to be awarded for correct answer
        an - the correctAnswer Number
